Container.Name: Octo-Fiesta
Container.Overview: A Subsonic API proxy server that transparently integrates Deezer as a music source. When a song is not available in your local Navidrome library, it is automatically fetched from Deezer, downloaded, and served to your Subsonic-compatible client. The downloaded song is then added to your library, making it available locally for future listens.
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: navidrome subsonic deezer music streaming proxy download

Container.Requires: Requires a Deezer account and a separate Subsonic-compatible server.

Config.Name: Subsonic URL
Config.Description: The URL of your Subsonic server

Config.Name: Deezer ARL Token
Config.Description: Your Deezer ARL token for accessing Deezer content

Config.Name: Deezer ARL Token Fallback
Config.Description: Fallback Deezer ARL token if the primary one fails

Config.Name: Deezer Quality
Config.Description: Preferred audio quality for Deezer downloads. Remove to default to highest.

Config.Name: Internal Downloads Path
Config.Description: Internal path to downloaded files. Not recommended to change.

Config.Name: App Environment
Config.Description: Set the ASP.NET Core environment. Not recommended to change.

Config.Name: Storage Mode
Config.Description: Set the storage mode for downloaded files.

Config.Name: Cache Duration (Hours)
Config.Description: Duration in hours to cache files if using Temporary storage mode.
